Package org.presentation.persistence.business

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PersistenceFacade
    Interface which serves as middle business side between modules, which requires ability to query data from and to database, and the specific implementation of implementation of integration DAO classes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PersistenceFacadeImpl
    Specific implementation of PersistenceFacade interface, which offers functionality of EJB specification - support for concurrency management and transactions.
